itemdesc-wickerpack: Woven of long grass and reeds, this humble pack is a reminder of a truth in this world now. Adapt, or die.
itemdesc-bladehead-forlorn-short-meteori: A shard of the heavens, made to pierce the darkness.
blockdesc-wandererlantern-up: The crystal inside thrums with energy, its light harsh and unyielding, but it holds the shadows at bay, for now.
blockdesc-ironbomb-ore: Thread and cloth are rare in the depths, we make due with what we find down here.
